problem_names: lemma Sem_no_zero_height_derivsAux: "\<forall> s t. ((s, c \<rightarrow>\<^sub>0 t) --> False)"

lemma SemnDeterm[rule_format]:
"(s, c \<rightarrow>\<^sub>n t) ==> (\<forall> r m . (s, c \<rightarrow>\<^sub>m r) --> m=n \<and> r=t)"
lemma SemDeterm: "\<lbrakk>s, c \<Down> t; s, c \<Down> r\<rbrakk> \<Longrightarrow> r=t"

lemma SemnDeterm[rule_format]:
"(s, c \<rightarrow>\<^sub>n t) ==> (\<forall> r m . (s, c \<rightarrow>\<^sub>m r) --> m=n \<and> r=t)"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1.  s , c \<rightarrow>\<^sub>n  t  \<Longrightarrow>
    \<forall>r m.
        s , c \<rightarrow>\<^sub>m  r  \<longrightarrow> m = n \<and> r = t

proof (prove)
goal (8 subgoals):
 1. \<And>s.
       \<forall>r m.
           s , Skip \<rightarrow>\<^sub>m  r  \<longrightarrow>
          m = 1 \<and> r = s
 2. \<And>t s x e.
       t = update s x (evalE e s) \<Longrightarrow>
       \<forall>r m.
           s , Assign x e \<rightarrow>\<^sub>m  r  \<longrightarrow>
          m = 1 \<and> r = t
 3. \<And>s c1 n r c2 m t k.
       \<lbrakk> s , c1 \<rightarrow>\<^sub>n  r ;
        \<forall>ra m.
            s , c1 \<rightarrow>\<^sub>m  ra  \<longrightarrow>
           m = n \<and> ra = r;
         r , c2 \<rightarrow>\<^sub>m  t ;
        \<forall>ra ma.
            r , c2 \<rightarrow>\<^sub>ma  ra  \<longrightarrow>
           ma = m \<and> ra = t;
        k = max n m + 1\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> \<forall>r m.
                             s , Comp c1
                                  c2 \<rightarrow>\<^sub>m  r  \<longrightarrow>
                            m = k \<and> r = t
 4. \<And>b s c n r m t k.
       \<lbrakk>evalB b s;  s , c \<rightarrow>\<^sub>n  r ;
        \<forall>ra m.
            s , c \<rightarrow>\<^sub>m  ra  \<longrightarrow>
           m = n \<and> ra = r;
         r , While b c \<rightarrow>\<^sub>m  t ;
        \<forall>ra ma.
            r , While b c \<rightarrow>\<^sub>ma  ra  \<longrightarrow>
           ma = m \<and> ra = t;
        k = max n m + 1\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> \<forall>r m.
                             s , While b
                                  c \<rightarrow>\<^sub>m  r  \<longrightarrow>
                            m = k \<and> r = t
 5. \<And>b s t c.
       \<lbrakk>\<not> evalB b s; t = s\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> \<forall>r m.
                             s , While b
                                  c \<rightarrow>\<^sub>m  r  \<longrightarrow>
                            m = 1 \<and> r = t
 6. \<And>b s c1 n t c2.
       \<lbrakk>evalB b s;  s , c1 \<rightarrow>\<^sub>n  t ;
        \<forall>r m.
            s , c1 \<rightarrow>\<^sub>m  r  \<longrightarrow>
           m = n \<and> r = t\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> \<forall>r m.
                             s , Iff b c1
                                  c2 \<rightarrow>\<^sub>m  r  \<longrightarrow>
                            m = n + 1 \<and> r = t
 7. \<And>b s c2 n t c1.
       \<lbrakk>\<not> evalB b s;  s , c2 \<rightarrow>\<^sub>n  t ;
        \<forall>r m.
            s , c2 \<rightarrow>\<^sub>m  r  \<longrightarrow>
           m = n \<and> r = t\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> \<forall>r m.
                             s , Iff b c1
                                  c2 \<rightarrow>\<^sub>m  r  \<longrightarrow>
                            m = n + 1 \<and> r = t
 8. \<And>s n t.
       \<lbrakk> s , body \<rightarrow>\<^sub>n  t ;
        \<forall>r m.
            s , body \<rightarrow>\<^sub>m  r  \<longrightarrow>
           m = n \<and> r = t\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> \<forall>r m.
                             s , Call \<rightarrow>\<^sub>m  r  \<longrightarrow>
                            m = n + 1 \<and> r = t

text\<open>The proof of determinism is by induction on the 
      (indexed) operational semantics.\<close>
lemma SemDeterm: "\<lbrakk>s, c \<Down> t; s, c \<Down> r\<rbrakk> \<Longrightarrow> r=t"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<lbrakk>s , c \<Down> t ; s , c \<Down> r \<rbrakk>
    \<Longrightarrow> r = t

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<lbrakk>s , c \<Down> t ; s , c \<Down> r \<rbrakk>
    \<Longrightarrow> r = t

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>n na.
       \<lbrakk> s , c \<rightarrow>\<^sub>n  t ;
         s , c \<rightarrow>\<^sub>na  r \<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> r = t

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>n na.
       \<lbrakk> s , c \<rightarrow>\<^sub>na  r ;
        na = n \<and> r = t\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> r = t
